title: Interpretation of seeing white robes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing white robes in a dream or a dream. A white robe is a white robe that can be in the form of a long or short cloak and seeing white robes in a dream can herald goodness or it can be a warning or warning of the appearance of evil. The white robe, whether single, married, pregnant or divorced, has various meanings. Today, through the Ruya website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a white robe in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing robes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing robes in a dream for a single person mentions that he will get married soon. Seeing women wearing robes Men: It indicates his weakness and his inability to determine his destiny or make his own decisions. Seeing yourself wearing a thick, heavy robe in a dream indicates the dreamer’s opposition to the teachings of religion and his actions that violate the law. Seeing a women’s robe in a dream indicates family problems and good arguments. Seeing a girl or woman taking off her robe. It symbolizes To every person discovering something that was previously hidden. Seeing a woman’s robes being taken off while she is happy and proud shows that he has done something great. Seeing a man’s robe in a dream denotes wealth and a lot of money. Looking at robes in general denotes invisibility, purity, nourishment, trust and security. Interpretation of a vision White robes in a dream. Seeing white robes in a dream expresses pleasure and joy for the viewer. Seeing white robes in a dream announces the marriage of an unmarried woman and an unmarried girl. Seeing white robes in a dream indicates a lot of sustenance and money. Check out white robes embroidered in silver colors. It symbolizes movement, travel, or academic excellence. And scientific and practical. I see myself cleaning white clothes in a dream. It states that the dreamer has corrected himself from his mistake by following the path of righteousness and sincere repentance. In his dream, the dreamer in white robes sees good news for his promotion in his work. Seeing dirty white robes indicates the problems and fears presented to the viewer. Seeing in a dream White clothes for a single woman: It symbolizes her good behavior and good reputation among people. Seeing dyed and white clothes indicates overcoming worries, problems and difficulties. Interpretation of seeing a white dress for a single woman in a dream. Seeing a white dress for an unmarried woman in a dream indicates good morals and a good reputation. Seeing a white dress in a dream For a single woman, it shows a lot of good things that she will get. Seeing buying a white dress in a woman’s dream indicates her marriage or getting a new job. Interpretation of seeing a white dress in a dream for a married woman. Seeing white clothes in a married dream: It shows a decent life that she enjoys. Seeing white clothes in a dream For a married woman, it indicates the stability of her married life. Seeing a married woman wearing a white dress shows that she is living happily with her husband and family. Seeing white clothes in a dream symbolizes the good news coming her way or it may indicate that she is performing the Hajj obligation.

title: The interpretation of seeing a beautiful face in a dream for a single woman has different interpretations

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing the beauty of the face in a dream for an unmarried woman has different interpretations. Every person has a blessing that God has honored him with, which is the face, because God Almighty always saves the man in his best form, and God Almighty. Beauty has honored people with the most beautiful appearance, and God Almighty has endowed women with refined beauty and softness, so some people see in their sleep, their beautiful face or someone else they know or do not know, so in this article today we will learn together about me. The interpretation of seeing the beauty of the face in a dream for a single woman has different interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a beautiful face in a dream for a single woman. Whoever sees in his dream a beautiful woman with a beautiful face, and this woman was trying to get closer to God, then this dream is one of the good visions that indicates that the dreamer will achieve happiness and hear the good news that he was waiting for. For a long time. If someone sees that he is looking in the mirror and sees that his face has become a beautiful shape and he feels happy and happy to see him in a dream, then this dream is one of the good dreams that warns the dreamer that he will obtain a prominent position among the people around him. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a beautiful face in a dream Single GirlOne of the most promising visions for a single girl is to meet a person with a beautiful face in a dream (male or female). Only God knows. If a girl sees in her dream that her face has become beautiful and more beautiful than it looks in reality, then this dream foretells that she will get rid of the problems she suffers from in her life, and it also indicates that she will hear good news in the coming period of her life. Unmarried girl She sees in her dream that a beautiful girl with a beautiful face comes in a dream, approaches her, hugs her, and kisses her, and the girl was satisfied with the presence of this beautiful girl, so this dream means that that girl will do it. You will achieve a lot of goodness, God willing. Some commentators said that this vision is good news for the girl that God Almighty will provide her with a good husband with whom she can live a calm, stable and happy life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a white face for an unmarried woman. One of the beautiful visions that a girl sees in her dream is that she sees a white face In her dream. This dream means that there is a young man who will meet her and feel love and attraction towards her and that he will propose to her. If the girl who saw this vision is suffering from problems or sorrows in her life, then this vision is good news that these problems will end and these obstacles will be overcome, and God knows best. If the girl sees that her face has transformed To the color white in a dream, then this dream is a good dream because it shows that there is someone who proposes to her and she feels comfortable with him and marriage will happen between them. With them. We have presented to you the interpretations that dream interpretation scholars have said about seeing the face of a beautiful, unmarried girl in a dream, and we would like to mention that interpretations of dreams are nothing but jurisprudential issues that may be true or false. A Muslim should not stop his life from these dreams.

title: Interpretation of seeing an old workplace in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the old workplace through Vision roy2a.com, leaving a job and moving to another job is one of the constantly occurring events that can be experienced by any person in society and the person who sees it in his dreams. The old workplace may raise his eyebrows and make him wonder what it means and whether it carries a sign. To know the interpretation of this vision, we show the difference of interpreters in interpreting the vision of the old work in the dream, according to the dreamer’s condition and circumstances, and whether he is single, married, or married. Relinquishing it or new work in detail, based on the opinion of major commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing Ibn Sirin’s old workplace: Seeing an old workplace in a dream It indicates freedom from problems and freedom from worries and sorrows. Seeing a place An old job in a dream indicates the injustice and unfairness that the viewer experiences in his life. Seeing an old workplace in a dream indicates difficulties and obstacles that stand in the dreamer’s way. Seeing a return to an old job in a dream indicates the lack of loyal friends or people close to the dreamer. See also: Interpretation Seeing Mecca in a dream. Interpretation of seeing old colleagues in a dream: Seeing old colleagues in a dream indicates the dreamer’s great responsibilities. Seeing old colleagues in a dream indicates the dreamer’s success and achievements in the current period. Seeing old colleagues in a dream indicates that the material affairs of the fortuneteller will witness a change for the better. Seeing old colleagues in a dream indicates the good relationship that brings together the fortuneteller with colleagues. See also: Interpretation of seeing dismissal from work in a dream. What is the interpretation of my return to my previous job: Seeing someone who was dismissed from his current job and returned to the previous job indicates the problems and difficulties he faces that hinder... His advancement.Seeing someone leaving his job and returning to the previous one. He says that he feels lonely and has no close friends.Seeing someone in his old jobIt indicates that he must avoid the mistakes of the past in order to succeed in the present.What is the interpretation of not accepting a job?Seeing someone applying for Seeing someone applying for a job and not being accepted indicates problems and crises that the viewer is going through that disturb his life. Seeing someone applying for a job and not being accepted indicates To the financial difficulties faced by God. Seeing someone applying for a job and not being accepted indicates anxiety, depression, and the bad psychological state he feels. See also: Interpretation of seeing a giant woman in a dream What does it mean to see yourself going to a new job? Seeing someone going to a job New in a dream: It indicates the next good thing for him and the achievement of his goals that he seeks. Seeing a man going to a new job in a dream indicates that he will get a promotion or a new position in his job. Seeing a married woman

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing hibiscus in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing hibiscus in a dream Hibiscus is one of the types of plants that a person cooks and eats in his life. Hibiscus is considered one of the elements rich in various nutrients that the human body needs today. Through our site, we present to you the interpretation of seeing hibiscus, translated and narrated by many of the great Arab translators and scholars for men, single girls, pregnant women, married men and divorced men. Interpretation of a dream about seeing hibiscus in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dream about hibiscus by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing hibiscus in a dream is a sign of optimism and good luck for the dreamer. Seeing hibiscus in a dream indicates the elimination of debts. Eating fresh hibiscus in a dream is a sign of marriage, especially if it is green. Seeing a green hibiscus student in a dream is a sign of success and distinction. Interpretation of a dream about hibiscus for a single woman Seeing hibiscus in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of the good events that she will witness soon, such as marriage. Interpretation of hibiscus in a dream for a woman collecting it in a dream, and this indicates her confidence in some people who are not in good condition. The interpretation explains Drinking hibiscus with a bad taste in a dream is the tension and stress that this girl is experiencing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing hibiscus for a married woman To see a married woman in a dream that she is cooking and preparing hibiscus, this indicates that the long-awaited need has run out. Seeing yourself eating cooked hibiscus in a married woman's dream is a sign of earning a living and money that she will get. The dream of hibiscus with yellow leaves in a dream indicates this illness and fatigue. If she sees that she is eating yellow hibiscus in a dream, she will be very sick. Seeing hibiscus burning in a dream is evidence that you will face a major financial crisis. Interpretation of seeing mallow for a pregnant woman Interpretation of hibiscus in a pregnant woman's dream is evidence of the health of the fetus. Eating green hibiscus in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the end of tension and stress, getting rid of sadness and problems, and you will have an easy time giving birth. Interpretation of seeing hibiscus for a man Seeing spoiled hibiscus in a dream is a sign of sadness and anxiety. Seeing delicious hibiscus in a dream is a sign that this person will benefit from a friend. Seeing eating cooked hibiscus in a dream is a welcome vision For a man. A dream about uncooked hibiscus in a dream is evidence of unexpected events that the dreamer will witness. Seeing hibiscus in a divorced woman’s dream If a divorced woman sees in a dream that someone is standing in front of her house and selling fresh green hibiscus, this is a sign that you will soon hear good and happy news. A righteous man who fears God lives with him in stability and happiness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. A cake mold in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said that seeing a cake being baked in a dream indicates a certain observation. The interpretation also differs if one thinks that he is eating or giving him bread or dividing it in a dream. Ibn Sirin even interpreted seeing someone eating bread in a dream because it differs according to the taste of the bread, so that if the taste

title: The 100 most important interpretations of a dream about a snake by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a living: The snake in the dreamer’s dream carries many connotations that he may not have expected. The snake is that creature whose name only refers to the soul and whose sight can also indicate some positive things in addition to the negatives that it expresses, and this we will learn about through our topic today. What is the interpretation of a dream about a snake? Seeing a snake in a dream is interpreted according to the condition that he felt. The individual has it or felt it in his dream, according to the feeling he experienced at the time of seeing it, which is the same feeling as a situation in his life. Is there a particular problem that you faced before you saw it in your vivid dream? Most likely there is something that is disturbing you and disturbing your life and making you live in a state of panic or at least anxiety, and it may be related to a woman who occupies your mind, but it is better to stay away from her because your love for her brings you problems that you cannot deal with or there are radical solutions to. Since the presence of snakes in... The dream or in reality in general is a symbol of betrayal and deception. Find the woman in your life and stand with you in her role and behavior. It can represent a deceitful person close to you, not necessarily a woman, and if your relationship with a woman is limited and she is not present in your life, there is a good chance that it is The symbol here is for a powerful colleague or rival who is using tricks and games that hurt you. If you have been wronged recently, the person who wronged you is the person the dream is referring to. Inevitably, take revenge on those who wronged you and heal the feeling of injustice in your chest. If you are a good person in your life and are not good at dealing with tricks and evasion, then you need to learn some of them to be among those around you who can only deal with them. In the event that you are nervous and irritable for the slightest reason, you may The dream symbolizes the need to learn calm, like a calm and smooth snake to achieve one’s goals easily. What is the interpretation of a dream about a snake according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin said that the snake represents enemies who conspire against you and are waiting for an opportunity to cause serious harm to you or someone close to you. Its appearance in human dreams can It is evidence of the presence of someone who wronged him and wants revenge, so the viewer must sit with himself calmly, review the previous pages of his life, and find out his mistakes. Perhaps he finds that he once made a mistake against another person, so he goes to him and asks him to give him permission and grant him his right that was stolen. But if he is found on his way alive and without poison, then he will marry a good girl, calm in nature, and very beautiful, who will treat him very kindly and will not harm him, but on the contrary, she will be his. A wife and a home, and in adversity he finds her by his side, to support and provide for him. The presence of a large snake in his dream expresses the presence of enmities that he created himself, as he may be the one with influence and power and does not hesitate to suppress others, which makes them agree to take revenge on him. But if he sees that the snake has entered The house of one of the sheikhs of the country in which he lives. He will soon hear the news of the death of that person and he may fall ill with a very serious illness. The snake in Ibn Sirin’s dream expresses evil and at the same time expresses softness and calm, as the characteristics of a life partner. What is the interpretation of the dream of living for a single woman

title: Speech of the dead in a dream

preview.html: Talking about the dead in a dream: Seeing a dead person in a dream is one of the visions that is frequently repeated in the dreams of many people, especially the talking about the dead person in a dream. Why not? Each of us has a deceased relative, and a person can see in his dream that the deceased is alive and speaks to him clearly and asks him about certain things. The person must search for the interpretation of this vision and the meanings it carries, which vary depending on the situation in which the deceased saw, and we will learn about the words of the dead in a dream through a different website. Interpretation of seeing the dead talking to you in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream is primarily a sign. On psychological concerns, because if a person dies, his first and last occupation is his other residence, so his relationship with the earthly world is cut off. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that if someone sees in his dream that the dead person is alive and speaks to him during his sleep and he already knows this dead person completely He came to him to tell him that he is alive and not dead, and this indicates the condition and status of the dead in heaven, and his comfort and good position in the afterlife. Interpretation of the words of the deceased in a dream: This vision symbolizes that everything the deceased says is the truth. If he hears something from the dead person, he tells him the truth about something, and this interpretation is due to the fact that the dead person is in the abode of truth, so what he says is not a lie. The interpretation of a dream about sitting with a dead person and talking to him indicates a state of longing that overwhelms the dreamer from time to time and prompts him to think about the past days that brought them together. The words of the dead person in the dream also suggest that we learn from what he said and extract some information that the dreamer neglected and lost his mind, which expresses the strong spiritual bond that connects the dreamer to that person, whether in life or after death. His departure. Seeing a dead person speaking to you in a dream is considered a specific message that he conveys to you and asking you to do everything mentioned in it. The words of the dead in a dream are considered a vision that heralds the dreamer of abundant abundance, and the words of the living dead are considered good news for the long life of the dreamer. And if one sees the words A dead person in a dream, and telling him that he is alive, this indicates that the dead man is in a good position with his Lord. But if a person sees the dead man’s words in a dream while he is angry or accusing him, this indicates that the dreamer is committing sins and disobedience and must repent and return to God. And if a person sees What do a dead person say in a dream and ask him for something like bread? This vision is evidence that this dead person needs to beg and receive alms from God. Read also: Beating a thief in a dream. The interpretation of the dead sets a date for the meeting. But if you dream of a dead person and he tells you that he will meet you on a certain date, this indicates The dreamer died on this date, and this is due to the confirmation of the dead person’s words, and God knows best. To dream of a dead person meeting you on a certain date indicates previous commitments and commitments between you and him. If the deceased is sad, this means not fulfilling promises, severing the relationship that was between you and the deceased, squandering his rights or stealing his money and efforts in life. And if

title: The 9 most important interpretations of seeing dough in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing dough in a man’s dream? It shows the halal money he gets. What does it mean to see yourself eating raw dough? He says unpleasant things. What is the interpretation of seeing sticky dough in a single woman’s dream? Evidence of achieving the goal. The meaning of seeing yeast fermenting in a dream For a man? Details of livelihood and a lot of money that can be earned. What is the interpretation of seeing dough in the oven in a pregnant woman’s dream? Evidence of the approaching date of birth. Interpretation of a dream about dough by Ibn Sirin. Dough in a person’s dream indicates the lawful money that he obtains. Whoever dreams of dough that has not yet risen, this It indicates that the dreamer is financially distressed. After that, seeing spoiled dough is evidence that the dreamer is spending his money on useless things. Whoever sees in a dream that he is kneading barley and it becomes a cohesive dough, this indicates that he is an honest person. Then whoever eats dough in a dream, and its taste Sweet, this indicates that he is in a hurry to make some decisions, but she will be right. Eating raw dough portends unpleasant things. A dream about dough for single people. Bread dough in one dream indicates goodness. Then seeing a girl in a dream making dough from fenugreek or Barley and began to ferment, this indicates the approach of her marriage. Dough in one dream is evidence of success and the fulfillment of desires. Then seeing white dough in the dream shows the good morals of the girl and the achievement of all goals. If she sees that she is eating yeast that has not yet matured, this means that she will make wise and thoughtful decisions. In her life. Then, if the girl sees in a dream good dough, this is a sign of joy and pleasure. Seeing firm dough in the dream of an unmarried woman is evidence of achieving goals. Interpretation of a dream about dough for a married woman If a married woman sees that she keeps dough in the refrigerator, this indicates that she She will not be exposed to poverty and will be provided with sufficient means. So, seeing dough in a married woman’s dream is a sign of kindness, abundance of sustenance, and a stable married life. So, seeing puff pastry in a dream is a sign of sincere relationships and getting rid of haters in her life. Dream of dough For a man: A dream about dough for a man may indicate money and halal profit. So, seeing a man making many pastries in a dream means kindness, blessing, and good deeds performed by the dreamer. Seeing yeast fermenting in a dream for a man is a sign of nourishment and a lot of money that he will receive. Interpretation of a dream Dough for a pregnant womanDough in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates kindness and blessing. If a pregnant woman sees that she is kneading white flour, this indicates that she heard the happy news. Then seeing the dough after it rises, this means that the date of birth is near, available, and without pain. Seeing dough in the oven in a dream A pregnant woman is evidence that her due date is approaching and that she and the fetus will be fine.

title: Seeing someone laughing in a dream

preview.html: Join us through gptafser.com/ to learn about the full interpretation of the vision from the perspective of scientists, to find out the interpretation of the vision in the case of every person. Interpretation of seeing someone laughing in a dream about a single girl. Scientists interpreted the single girl who sees someone laughing in her sleep according to the state of laughter and whether the laughter was High. The vision indicates her success and excellence in studies and her ability to achieve all her desires. If the laugh that the girl sees in her dream is loud and disturbing and the laughter is loud. The vision explained that the girl will be exposed to many difficulties and problems. An unmarried girl saw that someone was laughing in her dream And he fell in love with him. The vision showed her relationship and marriage with this person. And that he will give her happiness and joy in the coming days. An unpleasant vision is to see a girl laughing loudly during her sleep. It shows separation if she is engaged or separated if she is in love. The unmarried girl laughed in her dream Sarcastic, meaning suffering and worries. When a single girl smiles slightly with her friends in her sleep. Evidence that she will live a beautiful stage in her next life. Laughter, good news, is appreciated by the closeness of a husband or lover. You may be interested: Interpretation of a dream about laughter for single people. Interpretation of seeing someone laughing in A dream about a married woman: Laughing in a married woman’s dream is good news for all goodness and benefit, and evidence of the happiness that she will experience soon. Laughing in a dream about a married woman, but in an unpleasant, hysterical way. This is because it indicates the emergence of problems and disagreements with the husband. Among the good visions is a married woman laughing quietly. In a dream, without sound. It indicates happiness, joy, and good news. Quiet laughter in a married woman’s dream is good news for a stable life and a bright future with her family. For a married woman to laugh quietly in her dream, this means that she has overcome her worries and sorrows. As for seeing someone laughing On it, this indicates the benefit that you will gain from it. Laughing sarcasm is exposure to a disease, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing someone laughing in a dream about a man and its meaning: Seeing a man in a dream laughing loudly and loudly. An unpleasant vision, indicating that the dreamer is exposed to worries and sorrows. As for seeing a man In a dream, while he is smiling quietly, it is a promising vision for the arrival of happy news and joys. Seeing a man laughing quietly also means that he will give birth to a male child. As for mockery of laughter in a dream, it is disappointment, and the vision also indicates that the dreamer is afflicted with an illness, and God knows best. As for the man who sees... Dreaming that he is laughing at another person in mockery is evidence of not achieving what he wants. The vision also indicates that there are disagreements between the man and his wife. A man laughing in a dream with one of his relatives shows the love and tenderness that bind them. Among the repulsive visions in a man’s dream is him laughing out loud, which indicates However, his relatives are angry with him because of his bad deeds. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about laughing with relatives. The meaning of seeing someone laughing in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing a pregnant woman in her dream is that she is laughing at good visions, as this indicates that she will achieve what she wants, and she will achieve all her goals. The vision also suggests pleasure And

title: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake chasing me

preview.html: Interested in searching for interpretations and meanings of this vision, and through this article we will learn about it and explain it more through the Mufsir.com website. Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream for a single girl Seeing in a dream an unmarried girl working on a black snake in her bed. This is evidence that she did not follow the teachings of her religion and its legal controls while sitting with her fiancé. And that she does forbidden things and angers her Lord, she must repent and avoid these actions so that she does not fall into more sins and disobedience. While if an unmarried girl sees that a black snake bites her neck in a dream. It is a sign that she is being raped by strangers who take good care of her. While if an unmarried girl sees a black snake in her dream, she is not afraid and confronts it. This indicates that her personality is strong and she can stand up to anyone who tries to violate her right. If an unmarried girl sees that she befriends and loves a black snake and is not afraid of it in a dream. It indicates that he is emotionally attached to a person known for evil and misleads her about his love for her. But he tries to harm her, this vision is a warning to her, so she must She warns him and avoids him so that he is safe from his harm and is fine, God willing. The black snake in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates that one of her relatives is trying to harm her. He must be very careful with them and not trust anyone easily so that he can escape their evil and harm. The bite of a black snake that bites an unmarried girl in a dream is an indication that she will be harmed and that her enemies will be able to do so. The black snake in the dream of an unmarried girl symbolizes her wisdom and her great confidence in her mind when making her own decisions. See also: Interpretation of seeing a large snake in a dream Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream for a married woman The black snake in the dream of a married woman indicates the presence of a person who feels jealous and spiteful of her life and wants to take away the blessings she lives. And to beware of those who deal with them and not trust them easily so that he does not fall into their harm. A black snake bites a married woman in a dream. It is an indication that he will be exposed to problems, crises and obstacles in the coming days and will have his time, God willing. A married woman killed a black snake in a dream, indicating that she will be able to From getting rid of an enemy who was trying to harm her without harming her. The black snake for a married woman in a dream may indicate a mean-spirited friend who is jealous of her life and wants to destroy her home. She must take care of her so that she does not get into problems that lead to divorce or separation from her husband. If a married woman dreams that a black snake is trying to bite her husband. She tries to keep the snake away from her husband and kill it so that no harm comes to him. This is a sign of some problems and crises occurring and she will stand by him and help him overcome this crisis well, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream for a man and its meaning If a man kills the snake after biting him, this is a sign that he will get rid of his worries and problems after losing some things that are important to him. Or it also indicates victory over his enemies who devise plots and tragedies against him after a great loss of his money.

title: Interpretation of bowing in a dream and seeing bowing in a dream

preview.html: The dream of prostration indicates victory over the enemy, and other interpretations we translate for single, married, pregnant, and divorced women to men, such as seeing prostration on land or water. Kneeling and praying in the mosque, or dreaming of prostrating in the street, the first or second prostration, prostration of thanks, or prostration to others. And God in Ibn Sirin and more in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of bowing in a dream Worshiping in a dream indicates that the dreamer will teach the lesson that should be taught to an enemy who has been cooperating for a long time, and when he found the opportunity he began to do bad things against him, and he will get a lot. Of gains through the deeds he created, and he will soon live better days. Kneeling in a dream is considered a very good vision, which means light for a person and getting away from all his problems and worries. It means that a man marries a woman with a beautiful face and heart as well. It is a sign for married men and women of a friend who will take their fears off their shoulders. It expresses that the dreamer will achieve the best and best of what he wants in the world, he will be at ease next to his wife, his face will laugh, and morally he will live joyfully. Religious duties It is an important issue for the person who worships in a dream. He also informs his family about this. The vision, which means reward with God and helping the needy and the poor, indicates a person with a good nature and everyone’s admiration for him. It is a very good and blessed vision. Acceptance means because you are one of the righteous slaves, you have strength, ability and wisdom, you are attached to the path of truth, you have morals and religious values, you do good deeds, you pay zakat and zakat, you have good intentions, you are a true believer and you guide the unbelievers. It also means joy, affirmation, happiness and health. It is also interpreted as guidance to the dreamer and bestowal of goodness from God. Bowing is a very blessed vision. It is interpreted as luck, participation and optimism. It indicates that the dreamer will always live his life in peace and comfort, and will be pure in heart and with good intentions and will not face difficulties, misfortunes, accidents or disasters. Bowing in a dream indicates the removal of sadness, the renewal of the means of life, and the dreamer’s reward for whoever seeks it. The vision of bowing and praising In a dream, it is interpreted by the beauty of morals and the strength of faith. It expresses the religiosity of the dreamer. Praying and prostrating in a dream indicates that the person will go to the Kaaba and quarantine Satan. Sleeping after bowing in a dream shows the good deeds of the dreamer. It also expresses the act of communicating, loving an orphan, and giving alms to those in need. Its meaning is that whoever sees himself sitting after prostrating in a dream, he will be supported by God’s mercy. Whoever prostrates in a dream, bowing to the rules, then he will maintain the commandment of good and forbid evil, and a high rank. If the bow of thunder bows, it indicates dignity and obedience. If the worship is for the worship of Mary, it indicates grace and indulgence. Elevation is for destiny in this world and the hereafter. If he prostrates during the first prostration of Hajj, it is a warning and terror because of the negligent person. If the second prostration is a prostration, then it is a vow of obedience, a command to do good, and a prohibition of evil. If he prostrates to the standard, it is evidence of an aversion to obedience and disobedience. And if something slips
